about_the_game:
In order to seize the martial arts scriptures of our sect, the cult suddenly attacked our sect, causing countless deaths and injuries to our disciples. The leader used all his strength to take away several disciples and some treasures, and hid with the disciples in wooden houses in nearby mountains and forests. During this time, there were passersby and scattered guests passing by, and the investigation of the cult's children was conducted. Whether you can safely wait for the rescue of other brother sects depends on how you choose your daily choices.

Random events that can be experienced in multiple rounds:

You can play multiple rounds and weeks, and there will also be different gaming experiences.

Martial arts simulation:

In the game, heroes can eat, practice martial arts, and encounter various random events in the martial arts world, simulating a free world.

Random events:

While waiting with the leader, one can encounter various martial arts events when going out.

Multiple outcomes:

There are no less than 10 endings and a large number of randomly combined martial arts events in the game.

The leader was seriously injured and suffered a deep loss of internal strength. He regained some physical strength. When his consciousness recovered, he felt that there were still some disciples to bring. Which disciples should he bring with him or abandon his disciples to carry more treasures? As the leader, in order to achieve the great cause of the sect, you must make choices and choices:
